column5: ....Sweet

Well on monday i headed to my buds place on sturgeon lake for some walleye fishing ,and maybe a big muskie....well the lake didnt dissapoint....we hit the lake about 5:00am mon morn,and we started at a few fav,shoals for some walleyes,well we were on fire,by 9:am we had 7 fish,they were all sizes from 12inchers to one fish my bud got at 5lbs.28 inches...very nice fish indeed....well we hit several areas of the lake and also caught lots of smallies,and a few big perch as a bonus....monday night was even better after a big fish-fry we were at it again,and caught i think...9more all between 1-2.5lbs....most fish were all caught trolling weedlines,around shoals and drop-offs....we also found a few new spots with lots of gravel & rocks and we hit a few more,and today while we were trolling our new shoal....BANG...what a thumping hit....and just what i thought a real nice battle with a muskie began....and i acually landed it with 8lb test no leader and a bottom-bouncer,with a worm harness.....so after a few quick pics...she was on her way..we got a few more fish and called it a day,we maybe seen 10 boats in 2 days it was great....so enjoy the pics,my bud ernie will post some more when he gets to post them...all in all we think we got around 20 walleyes & dozen smallies,1 musky,a few perch....the ski was 36.5inches, 12lbs.....cheers LOTS OF PICS FISH & SCENERY & BOAT
great report and pics.Looks like you had a really good trip,congrats
Nice boat Dude.Way to go Shawn nice report.Thanks
What a great report, some nice fish there!
Beauty fish Shawn.  Are those pics of the fog rolling out?  Joey

Yes joey,its the fog rolling down the lake toward us,it was spooky,and ten mins later we couldnt see 10ft...but it kept the fish biting for a couple of hours,cause it blocked the sun till about 9am...it was so cool....
Great pics and nice report Shawn!!!  Sounds like you guys were busy!!!!  Nice Muskie.....what am I saying.....nice everything!!  WTG!  Bill
great report and pics man!

Wow Shawn!  Great report and pics!  That is a great looking muskie...and landed with 8 pound mono...nice work!!  Great scenery shots as usual.  Plenty of nice bass and eyes there...a great multi species report!
Great report Shawn!  I love mixed bag days.
wow Shawn it looks like you had a great time out there!!
WTG Shawn, it's always good when a plan comes together !!  Nice to see the new boat is working out so well for you too.
Man you make it look easy Bud you catch more fish in one day than I catch in one weekend.  MTP
Very nice Shawn. You've had a great year of fishing so far. Thanks for another fine report.  Mike
After seeing this report I am looking forward to hitting Sturgeon starting Friday.  Hopefully the cold front this weekend doesn't turn the fish off.........  Tom
Nice report Shawn
Beauty report Shawn, great mix of species there and that pickeral stringer has me drooling on my keyboard.
Great Report! Looks like someone is going to be eating good. Nice dark musky!
Nice muskie Shawn and nice bass too

You both did SO amazing for the couple of days that you were fishing!   It works out perfectly for us, I take care of the homefront, and you do what you love and I am always happy when you have great days fishing, you well deserve it and we have great dinners because of you.   Aren't you glad that I told you to say there for the night since the fishing was great???LOL   And Ernie, you did awesome for yourself and I hope that the fish keep biting, it will keep you busy for awhile   Again,  YOU GUYS DID AMAZING!!!!
Nice fish Shawn.  I should have headed out with you.  I drove a the way to Erie to find out all the boat rentals were done for the season.
oh man that sucks !!!!! well maybe next time,thanks for  the PM a few nights ago...cheers
Nice fish. I love the pic of the fog rolling in.
great report that one walleye is a tank wtg

Excellent report and some really good photos!  I got out last Sunday morning for a bit but it was so windy that I couldn't fish the area I wanted to. I did a bit of exploring but only got a few small mouth.  About noon the wind had died down a bit so I headed back out again and the fishing was better than I have seen it in years. I couldn't believe it, middle of the day, wind out of the ENE but in the first 15 minutes I had three walleye in the boat all in the 15-17 inch range.  I continued fishing for about two more hours and managed several very large perch a few small mouth, one more walleye (a little smaller than the others), and  one nice large mouth.
